ssGUI::​ImageFormat
struct
ssGUI::​ImageFormat

Default is RGBA 8 bit per channel with non alpha pre-multiplied.

Variables

Indicates the image type

How many bits per channel

BitPerPixel
int BitPerPixel

How many biys per pixel

HasAlpha
bool HasAlpha

If this image contains alpha.  If this value is set to true for type MONO but IndexA is set to -1, then it will treat black as transparent

bool PreMultipliedAlpha
